title: Remove bill section from balance sheet display

requirements.summary: Remove the bill-related section from the balance sheet view while preserving all other daily totals and item quantity displays
acceptanceCriteria: The bill section is no longer visible in the balance sheet view
Daily revenue totals continue to display correctly
Item quantities remain visible and functional
Clear-all functionality continues to work for remaining data

file_operations.description: Remove the bill-related section from the balance sheet display. Locate and delete the UI section that renders saved bills (likely a list or table showing individual bills with details). Keep the daily revenue totals card/section, the item quantities display, the day selection dropdown, and the clear-all button fully intact and functional. Ensure the remaining layout adapts properly without the removed section.
